name: combined-discord-bot
description: A comprehensive Discord bot combining onboarding with CAPTCHA verification, profile collection, alliance selection, and real-time translation with voice support

scripts.help:
echo "Available commands:
  npm start    - Start the Discord bot
  npm run dev  - Start in development mode with warnings
  npm run trace - Start with full deprecation traces
  npm run dashboard - Start the web dashboard
  npm run both - Start both bot and dashboard
  npm run both-trace - Start both with traces
  npm run setup - Setup environment"

author: Benjamin
